name: Team Coordinator
description: Team scheduling across multiple calendars. Finds common availability for group meetings.
workflow_hints: Start with list_calendars to discover all team members' connected calendars
Use get_availability with multiple calendar_ids for cross-calendar merge
Use privacy mode 'full' to see how many calendars contribute to busy blocks
Consider timezone differences â€” convert_timezone for distributed teams
Suggest 2-3 alternative slots when proposing meeting times
For recurring meetings, use expand_rrule to preview all instances before booking
Minimum 30-minute slots unless participants agree to shorter
Check all participants' availability before booking any slot
